name: actions_set-repo-access-to-self-hosted-runner-group-in-org
description:
Replaces the list of repositories that have access to a self-hosted runner group configured in an organization.
You must authenticate using an access token with the `admin:org` scope to use this endpoint.

runner_group_id.description: Unique identifier of the self-hosted runner group.

selected_repository_ids.description: List of repository IDs that can access the runner group.
